// components/AIWarningModal.tsx import React from 'react'; interface AIWarningModalProps { onAccept: () => void; } export default function AIWarningModal({ onAccept }: AIWarningModalProps) { return (
⚠️

Important: AI Usage Strictly Prohibited

We have detected participants using AI tools to generate or refine responses.

This is strictly against the study guidelines.

Using AI in any capacity - whether to generate answers, refine your thoughts, or assist with responses - completely compromises the validity of the data we are collecting. We need authentic human responses for this research to be meaningful.

Consequences of AI Usage:

  • Immediate reporting to Prolific
  • Compensation will not be provided
  • Participation in the study will be terminated
  • Potential impact on your Prolific account standing

What We Expect:

Please provide your own authentic, thoughtful responses based on your personal knowledge and experiences. If you're unsure about something, it's perfectly fine to say so or explain what you do know.

By clicking continue, you acknowledge that you will not use AI tools and understand the consequences.

); }
